name: Touch the Human
description:
Touch the Human

Once upon a time, a human was given an opportunity. He came across a button that said it would give him immortality at the cost of having a snail follow him forever (if it touches him, he dies). He pressed the button. And you are the snail.

Your mission is clear now. But it won't be easy. He knows how to kill you - He got salt. A LOT of it.

Controls
  • Movement: WASD / Arrow keys
  • Restart: R
Notes

Made in 7 days for Curdle Jam 20

Difficulty Warning: There's an extremely tiny chance the game is hard as heck for people not used to any bullet hell, I tried playtesting more but honestly I just felt the game didn't want to be that easy.

Credits
  • Made by Cearaj
Assets used:
  • Heart art
  • Explosion effect
  • Salt shaker sfx
